key_points.text:
Schlumberger (SLB) Secures U.K. Approval for ChampionX Acquisition
Positive Sentiment:
The board declared a quarterly dividend of $0.285 per share, maintaining a yield above 3%.
Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.29
Positive Sentiment:
Morgan Stanley reiterated its Buy

SLB Earnings: SLB Stock Gushes Higher as Q2 Earnings Beat Forecasts
Neutral Sentiment:
SLB announced its second-quarter results via Form 8-K, detailing sequential revenue growth despite year-on-year declines.

Capital One Financial Forecasts Schlumberger FY2026 Earnings
Negative Sentiment:
Stifel Nicolaus lowered its price target to $52 from $54, though it kept a Buy rating.

Stifel Nicolaus Lowers Price Target on Schlumberger Limited (SLB) to $52, Keeps a Buy Rating
Negative Sentiment:
Piper Sandler cut its price target to $42 and assigned a Neutral rating.

SLB Announces Second-Quarter 2025 Results
Neutral Sentiment:
Transcript of the Q2 earnings call was published, offering detailed commentary from management.
Schlumberger Limited (SLB) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
Neutral Sentiment:
24/7
